javadoc: Service to show a component that has a JTable given a table model that builds up its data dynamically (a ThreadedTableModel).

methods.name: showTable
methods.comment: Creates a table view using the given model. This version does not create markers.

params.name: tableTypeName
params.comment:
The name of the table's type.  This is used to group like tables 
        together

params.name: windowSubMenu
params.comment: the name of a sub-menu to use in the "windows" menu.

params.name: navigatable
params.comment:
the component to navigate.  If null, the "connected" components will
        navigate.

return.comment: a provider to show a visible component for the data

methods.name: showTableWithMarkers
methods.comment: Creates a table view using the given model. This version creates markers.

params.name: tableTypeName
params.comment:
The name of the table's type.  This is used to group like tables 
        together

params.name: markerColor
params.comment: the color to use for the marker

params.name: markerIcon
params.comment: the icon to associate with the marker set.

params.name: windowSubMenu
params.comment: the name of a sub-menu to use in the "windows" menu.

params.name: navigatable
params.comment:
the component to navigate.  If null, the "connected" components will
        navigate.

return.comment: a provider to show a visible component for the data

name: TableService
comment:
Service to show a component that has a JTable given a table model
 that builds up its data dynamically (a ThreadedTableModel).
